body: I mean you could call it a clickbait but then if you read enough WEEKLY Kairakuten's issues, you'd notice the pattern for their cover pages, they are always a set of 3 covers of the same girl/theme but each time slightly different cg, and usually the first one of the set is where the story is feature (it could have multiple parts, and this is not exempt from exceptions, for example, like Dramus' "First come first served" but even this one is a bit complicated since Dramus jumped around the timeline on this one with prequels and such). So for this cover, the story was featured in WEEKLY Kairakuten 2021 No.46: https://nhentai.net/g/383651/
Damn cover is a fcking clickbait
